channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 比利时总理表示需要建立没收2800亿欧元俄罗斯资产的机制
item.description: Belgium does not oppose the confiscation of 280 billion euros worth of frozen Russian central bank assets, but there needs to be a clear mechanism such as using the assets as collateral for Ukraine, Prime Minister Alexander De Croo told Reuters.翻译:比利时总理亚历山大·德克罗对路透社表示，比利时并不反对没收价值2800亿欧元的俄罗斯央行冻结资产，但需要有一个明确的机制，例如将这些资产用作乌克兰的抵押品。
item.author: Dmitry Zhdannikov

item.title: 独家：比亚迪因泄漏问题将停止为其混合动力电动汽车生产软包电池--消息人士
item.description: China's BYD plans to end production of the pouch-type batteries used in its best-selling hybrids as the automaker seeks to address durability concerns and the risk that they could leak, said three people familiar with the matter.翻译:三名知情人士表示，中国比亚迪计划停止生产其最畅销的混合动力汽车中使用的袋式电池，因为该汽车制造商寻求解决耐用性问题和电池可能泄漏的风险。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国上汽集团将新增14艘汽车船以促进出口
item.description: SAIC Motor Corp plans to add 14 vehicle vessels in the next three years to its fleet of carriers as the state-owned Chinese automaker aims to boost sales in overseas markets, it said on Wednesday.翻译:中国国有汽车制造商上汽集团周三表示，该公司计划在未来三年内为其运输船队增加 14 艘汽车船，以提高海外市场的销量。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 克里姆林宫表示沙特融入金砖国家的工作非常重要
item.description: The Kremlin said on Wednesday that it regarded work to integrate Saudi Arabia into the BRICs bloc of developing countries very important and said such work was continuing.翻译:克里姆林宫周三表示，它认为沙特阿拉伯融入发展中国家金砖四国集团的工作非常重要，并表示此类工作正在继续。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 欧洲央行强硬言论、中国数据令人失望，欧洲股市暴跌
item.description: European shares extended losses on Wednesday as more hawkish remarks from European Central Bank (ECB) officials tempered interest rate cut expectations, while glum economic data from China further soured investor sentiment.翻译:欧洲央行(ECB)官员的鹰派言论削弱了降息预期，而中国疲弱的经济数据进一步削弱了投资者情绪，周三欧洲股市扩大跌幅。
item.author: Shristi A

item.title: 疲软的数据和有限的刺激措施使投资者远离中国
item.description: China's patchy economic growth and a renewed slump in home sales have redoubled investors' resolve to steer clear of the country's markets, sending shares tumbling as foreigners quit in the absence of fresh policy support.翻译:中国经济增长的不稳定和房屋销售的再度下滑，使得投资者更加坚决地避开该国市场，导致股市暴跌，因为外国人在缺乏新的政策支持的情况下退出。
item.author: Tom Westbrook

item.title: 2022年，尽管和谈正在进行中，印度和中国军队还是发生了两次冲突
item.description: Indian and Chinese soldiers clashed at least two times in 2022 along their Himalayan frontier where they have been involved in a bitter standoff since 2020, according to new details that have emerged from the Indian Army's gallantry award citations.翻译:印度陆军英勇奖颁奖典礼上公布的新细节显示，2022 年，印度和中国士兵在喜马拉雅边境沿线至少发生了两次冲突，自 2020 年以来，印度和中国士兵一直陷入激烈的对峙。
item.author: Krishn Kaushik

item.title: 首名控方证人在香港出庭指证黎智英
item.description: The first prosecution witness to testify in a landmark national security case against Hong Kong media tycoon Jimmy Lai said on Wednesday he had been instructed by Lai to call people to join protests in 2019 and draw the attention of western democracies.翻译:第一位在针对香港媒体大亨黎智英的具有里程碑意义的国家安全案件中作证的控方证人周三表示，他受黎智英的指示，号召人们参加2019年的抗议活动，并引起西方民主国家的注意。
item.author: Jessie Pang, Edward Cho

item.title: 中国降价后，特斯拉在德国下调 Model Y 价格
item.description: Tesla Inc has slashed prices of its Model Y cars in Germany, where it lost the spot as top electric vehicle seller to Volkswagen in 2023, a week after the carmaker reduced its Model 3 and Model Y prices in China.翻译:特斯拉公司大幅下调了其 Model Y 汽车在德国的价格，并在 2023 年将德国最大电动汽车销售商的位置让给了大众，而一周前该汽车制造商降低了其在中国的 Model 3 和 Model Y 价格。
item.author: Hyunjoo Jin

item.title: 中国官方媒体从台湾转向瑙鲁后竞相进军瑙鲁
item.description: A reporter from Xinhua landed in Nauru on Wednesday, the first from China's official news agency to step foot on the remote Pacific Islands nation after it ditched Taiwan for China, as Chinese state media raced to build up its local presence.翻译:新华社的一名记者周三抵达瑙鲁，这是中国官方通讯社在这个偏远的太平洋岛国放弃台湾转而投向中国后首次踏足这个偏远的太平洋岛国，而中国官方媒体正在竞相扩大在当地的影响力。
item.author: Ryan Woo

item.title: 突发观点：中国消费者让北京和世界感到紧张
item.description: All eyes will be on China’s consumers in 2024. The economy expanded 5.2% year-on-year in the fourth quarter, thanks to manufacturing. But maintaining the momentum will be tricky as local demand remains weak. Factories are starting to look abroad to cope with overcapacity, which will stoke global trade tensions. How Beijing spurs domestic consumption will be vital.翻译:2024年，所有人的目光都将集中在中国消费者身上。第四季度经济同比增长5.2%，这得益于制造业。但由于当地需求依然疲弱，保持这一势头将很困难。工厂开始将目光投向海外，以应对产能过剩，这将加剧全球贸易紧张局势。北京如何刺激国内消费至关重要。
item.author: Chan Ka Sing

item.title: 中国表示对台湾的武力威胁并非针对大多数台湾人
item.description: China's position that it will not renounce using force to bring Taiwan under its control is aimed at foreign interference and a tiny number of separatists, but Taiwanese need to be disabused of "biases" against China, the government said on Wednesday.翻译:中国政府周三表示，中国不会放弃使用武力控制台湾的立场是针对外国干涉和极少数分裂分子，但台湾人需要消除对中国的“偏见”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国帮助太平洋岛国开展治安而非国防——大使
item.description: China has a strategy to help Pacific Island nations with policing, not defence, and its growing presence in the region should not alarm Australia, China's ambassador to Australia said on Wednesday.翻译:中国驻澳大利亚大使周三表示，中国有一项帮助太平洋岛国维持治安而非国防的战略，其在该地区日益增长的影响力不应令澳大利亚感到惊慌。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 中国国家互联网信息办公室正在对 Shein 进行审查 - 华尔街日报
item.description: The Cyberspace Administration of China is conducting a cybersecurity review of online retailer Shein's data handling and sharing practices, the Wall Street Journal reported.翻译:据《华尔街日报》报道，中国国家互联网信息办公室正在对在线零售商 Shein 的数据处理和共享做法进行网络安全审查。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 即时观点：中国四季度GDP增长5.2%，不及市场预期
item.description: China's economy expanded 5.2% in the fourth quarter from a year earlier, official data showed on Wednesday, missing analysts' expectations slightly but still making it possible for Beijing to meet its annual growth target.翻译:周三官方数据显示，中国第四季度经济同比增长5.2%，略低于分析师预期，但仍有可能让北京实现年度增长目标。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国经济复苏令人失望，美元走强，油价下跌
item.description: Oil fell more than $1 on Wednesday as economic growth in China, the world's second-largest crude user, slightly missed expectations, raising concerns about future demand, while U.S. dollar strength dented investor's risk appetite.翻译:由于全球第二大原油消费国中国的经济增长略低于预期，引发对未来需求的担忧，而美元走强削弱了投资者的风险偏好，周三油价下跌逾 1 美元。
item.author: Paul Carsten

item.title: 中国2023年GDP显示经济复苏不平衡，增加了刺激的理由
item.description: China's economy grew 5.2% in 2023, slightly more than the official target, but the recovery was far shakier than many analysts and investors expected, with a deepening property crisis, mounting deflationary risks and tepid demand casting a pall over the outlook for this year.翻译:2023年中国经济增长5.2%，略高于官方目标，但复苏远比许多分析师和投资者的预期更不稳定，房地产危机加深、通货紧缩风险加大以及需求不温不火给今年的前景蒙上阴影。
item.author: Kevin Yao, Ellen Zhang

item.title: 世界股市受到降息阻力打击，美元大放异彩
item.description: World stocks fell on Wednesday as markets grappled with a central bank push back against interest rate cut expectations and signs of a patchy economic recovery for China.翻译:世界股市周三下跌，因市场面临央行抵制降息预期以及中国经济复苏不平衡的迹象。
item.author: Dhara Ranasinghe

item.title: 中国人口连续第二年下降 出生率创历史新低
item.description: China's population fell for a second consecutive year in 2023, as a record low birth rate and a wave of COVID-19 deaths when strict lockdowns ended accelerated a downturn that will have profound long-term effects on the economy's growth potential.翻译:2023年，中国人口连续第二年下降，原因是创纪录的低出生率和严格封锁结束后出现的一波新冠肺炎死亡潮加速了经济衰退，这将对经济增长潜力产生深远的长期影响。
item.author: Farah Master

item.title: 尽管有政府支持，中国房地产市场下滑仍在加剧
item.description: China's troubled property market ended last year with the worst declines in new home prices in nearly nine years, despite government efforts to prop up the sector that was once a key driver of the world's second largest economy.翻译:尽管政府努力支撑曾经是世界第二大经济体关键驱动力的房地产行业，但去年中国陷入困境的房地产市场以近九年来最严重的跌幅结束。
item.author: Liangping Gao, Ryan Woo
